author: bencomic

right.text: I'm sure bashing me must be wearing a little thin now

left.text: jeez, can't you, you know, find something better to do with your spare time?
especially because you've got what you wanted, I've left DMZX and Espernet

right.text: having said my piece, I'm gonna bore you now by NOT talking about FF8. Or the MZX community

title: BUT IN THE END, IT DOESN'T EVEN MATTER
